Sub createRepord() Dim vStatus as Variant GlobalScope.BasicLibraries.LoadLibrary("ALADIN") StatusBar(True) ToolBar(True) FormSizePrint() if oDoc.isReadOnly then Dim oController as Object
oController = oDoc.CurrentController oController.setFormDesignMode(False)
SetDocUserProperty("oUserID_lokal", iUserID("PrintArbeitsblatt")) SetDocUserProperty("oEinstellungsID_lokal", iEinstellungsID(iUserID_lokal)) SetDocUserProperty("oTitle_lokal",sTitle(iUserID_lokal))
Kontaktdaten.KontaktDaten() if iSerienbrief=1 then Serienbriefverteiler.SerienBriefVerteiler() vStatus = MsgBox("Soll der Serienbriefverteiler ausgedruckt werden?",36,sTitle_lokal) if vStatus = 7 then Drucktabelle_leeren(iUserID_lokal) else SetUserID(iUserID_lokal) SerienbriefverteilerPrint() end if else Drucktabelle_leeren(iUserID_lokal) End If End if End Sub
Sub DokumentDrucken() Dim sFaxEmpfaenger as String if GetGUIType = 1 then if iPrint_Typ = 1 AND fsInTrim(sFax_Empfaenger) <> "" AND LCase(sFaxTyp) = "fritzfax" then if sFaxNumberPraefix <> "" AND Len(fsLeerzeichenEntfernen(sFax_Empfaenger)) > CInt(iFaxLenInternNumber) then sFaxEmpfaenger=fsLeerzeichenEntfernen(sFaxNumberPraefix & fsPlusErsetzen(sFax_Empfaenger)) else sFaxEmpfaenger=fsLeerzeichenEntfernen(sFax_Empfaenger) End if Set_FritzFax("PrintKorrespondenz",sFaxEmpfaenger) End if End if End Sub
Sub DokumentSchlieszen() sFaxNummer="" if GetGUIType = 1 then ReSet_FritzFax() End if End Sub
Sub ConvertToPdfAndSendMail() Dim sURL AS String,oPfad AS Object Dim sSubject AS String,sBody AS String
oPfad = CreateUnoService("com.sun.star.util.PathSettings")
sURL=ConvertToURL(oPfad.temp)&"/"& sDocumentID_mit_Praefix & ".pdf" oDoc.storeToURL(sURL,Array(MakePropertyValue("FilterName","writer_pdf_Export")))
sSubject=fsInTrim(fsReplace(fsReplace(fsReplace(fsReplace(sDocument_Name,Chr(34)," "),Chr(10)," - "),Chr(13)," - "),","," "))
sBody="Sehr geehrte Damen und Herren, " & Chr(10) & Chr(10) & "im Anhang finden Sie unser Dokument."
SendMail(sEMail_Empfaenger,sEMail,sSubject,sBody,sURL)
End Sub
Sub ConvertToPDF() Dim sURL as String Dim oFilePicker as Object,vStatusFilePicker as Variant Dim vStatus as Variant Dim initArgs(0)
initArgs=Array(com.sun.star.ui.dialogs.TemplateDescription.FILESAVE_AUTOEXTENSION_SELECTION )
oFilePicker = createUnoService("com.sun.star.ui.dialogs.FilePicker") sURL=ConvertToURL(sStandardPfad)
nochmal: oFilePicker.Initialize(initArgs) oFilePicker.MultiSelectionMode="False" oFilePicker.setDisplayDirectory(sUrl) oFilePicker.setDefaultName(sDocumentID_mit_Praefix &"__"& fsLeerzeichenErsetzen(sBetreff) & ".pdf") vStatusFilePicker=oFilePicker.execute
if vStatusFilePicker=0 then vStatus=MsgBox("Sie haben noch keinen Dateinamen ausgewählt!",37,sTitle_lokal) if vStatus=4 then goto nochmal elseif vStatus=2 then exit sub End if End if
sURL = oFilePicker.Files(0) oDoc.storeToURL(sURL,Array(MakePropertyValue("FilterName","writer_pdf_Export"))) End Sub
Function fAnzahlSerienbriefe as integer Dim oRecord1 as Object Dim sSQL2 as String sSQL2="select count(*) from "& sDrucker_TEMP(iUserID_lokal) oRecord1=oResult(sSQL2) While oRecord1.next() fAnzahlSerienbriefe=oRecord1.getInt(1) Wend End Function
Sub Document_ruecksetzen() Feld_fuellen("Anschrift_Eigen_1","Anschrift_Eigen_1") Feld_fuellen("Anschrift_Eigen_2","Anschrift_Eigen_2") Feld_fuellen("Anschrift_Eigen_3","Anschrift_Eigen_3") Feld_fuellen("Anschrift","Anschrift") Feld_fuellen("Leerzeilen","Leerzeilen") Feld_fuellen("Document_Typ","Document_Typ") Feld_fuellen("Document_Name","Document_Name") Feld_fuellen("Bemerkung","Bemerkung") Feld_fuellen("Schlusstext","Schlusstext") Feld_fuellen("Nummern","Nummern") Feld_fuellen("Leistungsprofil","Leistungsprofil") Feld_fuellen("Summe_ohne_MwSt","Summe_ohne_MwSt") Feld_fuellen("Rabatt","Rabatt") Feld_fuellen("Summe_nach_Rabatt","Summe_nach_Rabatt") Feld_fuellen("Abzug","Abzug") Feld_fuellen("Summe_nach_Abzug","Summe_nach_Abzug") Feld_fuellen("MwSt","MwSt") Feld_fuellen("Summe_mit_MwSt","Summe_mit_MwSt") Feld_fuellen("Kontakt_Bez","Kontakt_Bez") Feld_fuellen("Kontakt","Kontakt") Feld_fuellen("Bankverbindung_Bez","Bankverbindung_Bez") Feld_fuellen("Bankverbindung","Bankverbindung") Feld_fuellen("Geschaeftsfuehrer_Bez","Geschaeftsfuehrer_Bez") Feld_fuellen("Firmendaten","Firmendaten") oDoc.getTextFields().refresh() End Sub
Function FieldContent(sField as string) as String Dim vField as Variant,vFieldMaster as Variant Dim sFieldName as String sFieldName = "com.sun.star.text.FieldMaster.User." + sField vFieldMaster = oDoc.getTextFieldMasters.getByName(sFieldName) FieldContent = vFieldMaster.Content End Function
Sub Feld_fuellen(sField as string,sInhalt as string ) Dim vField as Variant,vFieldMaster as Variant Dim sFieldName as String sFieldName = "com.sun.star.text.FieldMaster.User." + sField vFieldMaster = oDoc.getTextFieldMasters.getByName(sFieldName) vFieldMaster.Content = sInhalt End Sub
Sub Feld_loeschen(sField as string) Dim vField as Variant,vFieldMaster as Variant Dim sFieldName as String Dim bFound as boolean vField = oDoc.createInstance("com.sun.star.text.TextField.User") sFieldName = "com.sun.star.text.FieldMaster.User." + sField bFound = oDoc.getTextFieldMasters.hasbyname(sFieldName) if bFound Then vFieldMaster = oDoc.getTextFieldMasters.getByName(sFieldName) vFieldMaster.Content = "" vFieldMaster.dispose() End If End Sub
Function iEinstellungsID_lokal as Integer iEinstellungsID_lokal=GetDocUserProperty("oEinstellungsID_lokal") End Function
Function iUserID_lokal as Integer iUserID_lokal=GetDocUserProperty("oUserID_lokal") End Function
Sub loesche_Falzmarken() Dim oDrawPage as Object Dim oShape as Object Dim iCount as Integer, iGetCount as Integer
oDrawPage = oDoc.getDrawPage()
iGetCount=oDrawPage.getCount()
for iCount=1 to iGetCount oShape = oDrawPage.getByIndex(iGetCount-iCount) if Instr(oShape.Name,"Falzmarken") > 0 then oDrawPage.remove(oShape) End if next iCount
End Sub
